aria.desc: High-end casino resort with a spa & a luxury mall, plus multiple restaurants & lounges.

bellagio.desc: Posh, Italian-inspired casino hotel with dancing fountains, plus a spa & multiple eateries.

hakkasan.desc: Renowned London-based Asian-fusion brand presents this massive MGM Grand nightclub, lounge & eatery.

harvest.desc: Farm-to-table New American fare & cocktails served in stylish surrounds with a display kitchen.

hyde.desc: Sprawling, stylish nightspot at Bellagio with patios overlooking fountains & multiple lounge spaces.

mgm.desc: Sprawling casino resort with renowned restaurants, high-wattage nightclubs & a 6-acre pool area.

omnia.desc: Vast Caesars club offers Top 40/hip-hop DJs plus bottle service & Strip views with Miami Beach vibe.

picasso.desc: Acclaimed New French eatery at the Bellagio featuring tasting menus & an array of original Picassos.

robuchon.desc: Gourmet French tapas & tasting menus by JoÃ«l Robuchon served in a modern space with counter service.

savoy.desc: Foodies flock to renowned chef Guy Savoy's refined spot for imaginative New French tasting menus.

tao.desc: Ritzy Asian eatery with a massive Buddha statue, select sushi & other Japanese, Chinese & Thai fare.

twist.desc: Pierre Gagnaire's French-American fine-dining destination on the Mandarin Oriental's 23rd floor.

venetian.desc: Opulent, Italian-themed casino hotel offering gondola rides, posh suites, shopping, a spa & dining.

wynn.desc: Lavish casino resort with luxe rooms, destination dining, shows & celebrity DJ-driven nightlife.

xs.desc: Lavish, gold-accented dance club in Encore featuring dance floor, poolside patio & headliner DJs.
